WorkItem.Description:
"any specs for implementing my dinner section? or can i start writing that section :)"

Well, let's brainstorm...

I figure when someone is logged in, you'd show a link on the home page for "My Dinners" or "Dinners I'm Hosting or Attending."

Then they'd visit "http://www.nerddinner.com/dinners/my" and see two sections:

"Hosting"
and 
"Attending"

How's that?

Also look at timezone issues on the server

Comments.Message: how about old dinners? still will be displaying them or have an archive link?

what about a notion of public vs. closed dinners?  
I would expect my dinners to contain all dinners that I either host or hosted and all that I am attending/attended.
